DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo control , crossover study determine antioxidant effect age garlic extract . This study also compare oxidative status heavy smoker non-smokers .
DOC.criteria: Smoking ( least 20 cigarette per day ) nonsmoking ( 20 year ) Under medication chronic disease Garlic allergy Engaging vigorous exercise Taking drug functional food may possess antioxidant property Participation clinical trial within 90 day commencement trial Renal hepatic dysfunction Heart disease
